CONTACT
For more information, fill in your contact details and we’ll get back to you.
Take a moment and let us know how we're doing. Whether you have some feedback about a recent visit or you have a great idea for the chef, we want to know. Whatever you have to say, we'd love to hear it!

photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: b441882b
Share by:
End Script tags

ABOUT US
WINE TASTING
navigation placeholders
THE STORY OF THE GREEK GRILL
Andrew and Lidiya Popkov immigrated to America in the early 2000s. They met, fell in love, and married. After the opening of their families restaurant, Paradise Village on Mt. Rainier in the beautiful state of Washington, the Popkovs knew they wanted to continue their calling of serving others here in Florida. Both from large families, their homes were always bustling with family and visitors. Throughout childhood they learned how families and friends bonded over lovingly crafted food. Their dream was to offer a restaurant with outstanding service, a home-like atmosphere, and meals made from scratch just like when they grew up.
After moving to Florida and an awe inspiring trip to Greece where they saw the importance of family, food and culture, they began the search for a restaurant to call their own. They found and purchased a Greek themed restaurant. The menu conveniently matched their culinary goals. The Greek Grille was born, the Popkovs have further developed and enhanced the menu and updated the restaurant's interior.
Relishing good wine and adoring Greek cuisine, the Popkovs enjoy loud get-togethers of friends and family around the table! Delicious Greek food can now be found close to home. The Greek Grille skillfully serves lamb shank, moussaka, and other authentic Greek dishes under the watchful eye of executive chef, Gary Golden, using the most authentic and highest quality ingredients. Greek Grille's traditional recipes and fine wines combined with the addition of friends and family makes the perfect combination for time well spent.
Come to enjoy the delicious authentic Greek cuisine and leave knowing you are now part of the Greek Grille family.
